If you haven't already, you will need to: Jika Anda belum melakukannya, Anda harus mengunduh elementary OS dari halaman beranda situs kami. Anda perlu menyalin berkas ISO yang telah diunduh ke perangkat ringkas USB dengan mengikuti petunjuk di bawah ini.
Intel i3 or comparable dual-core 64-bit: Intel i3 atau prosesor dual-core 64-bit lainnya yang sebanding
Make sure to back your important data up: Pastikan Anda mencadangkan seluruh data penting Anda ke lokasi eksternal seperti layanan penyimpanan awan atau perangkat diska eksternal. Memasang sistem operasi baru bisa menimpa ulang atau menghapus data Anda yang ada.
Choose your current Operating System: Pilih Sistem Operasi Anda saat ini
Select the operating system you are curr: Pilih sistem operasi yang saat ini Anda gunakan untuk melihat petunjuk pemasangan yang disesuaikan.
Verifying your download is an important,: Memverifikasi unduhan Anda adalah hal yang sangat penting, namun tidak harus dilakukan. Kami membuat sebuah checksum (atau hash sum) untuk berkas ISO elementary OS dan kami sangat merekomendasikan Anda memastikan checksum unduhan Anda sesuai dengan checksum yang kami sediakan sebelum Anda mulai memasang elementary OS. Hal ini untuk menjamin berkas ISO yang Anda unduh adalah yang asli dan lengkap dan menjamin tidak terjadi kerusakan saat proses pemasangan.
Windows doesn't include a built-in tool: Windows tidak menyertakan perkakas bawaan untuk memverifikasi checksum SHA256, jadi Anda harus mengunduh Hash Tool.
Under &quot;Input File&quot; select <cod: Di bawah "Input File" pilih Select File(s) dan temukan berkas ISO elementary OS
Verify that the text in &quot;Results&qu: Verify that the text in "Results" matches the following hash:
You'll need a USB flash drive with at le: Anda akan membutuhkan diska lepas yang memiliki ruang kosong minimal 2 GB dan sebuah program bernama Rufus
Insert your USB drive and select it in t: Masukkan perangkat USB Anda dan pilihlah di dalam daftar "Perangkat"
Select &quot;ISO Image&quot; next to &qu: Pilih "ISO Image" di sebelah "Buat disk bootable menggunakan..."
to choose the ISO that you downloaded pr: untuk memilih berkas ISO yang sebelumnya telah Anda unduh.
Click &quot;Start&quot; and wait for the: Klik "Mulai" dan tunggu sampai prosesnya selesai.
In order to start the installation proce: Dalam rangka memulai proses pemasangan, Anda harus menyalakan ulang komputer Anda dan boot dari perangkat pemasangan.
Assuming that your computer is still on,: Dengan asumsi komputer Anda masih menyala, mulai dengan memasukkan perangkat pemasangan dan nyalakan ulang komputer Anda.
Most computers will briefly allow you to: Beberapa komputer memperbolehkan Anda mengubah urutan boot untuk sementara dengan menekan tombol khusus — biasanya <kbd>F12</kbd>, atau <kbd>Esc</kbd> atau tombol fungsi lainnya. Untuk memastikannya, lihat petunjuk di layar atau baca panduan penggunaan komputer Anda.
Press <kbd>F12</kbd> (or the appropriate: Press <kbd>F12</kbd> (or the appropriate key) and select the install drive—usually "USB-HDD" or something containing the word "USB", but the wording may vary. If you choose the incorrect drive, your computer will likely continue to boot as normal. Just restart your computer and pick a different drive in that menu.
Shortly after selecting the appropriate: Shortly after selecting the appropriate boot drive, you should be presented with the elementary OS splash screen. You may now follow the on-screen instructions which will guide you through the rest of the process.
Running the following command in your Te: Menjalankan perintah berikut pada Terminal Anda:
Note: This is assuming that you have dow:
Note: This is assuming that you have downloaded the .iso file to your Downloads folder.
In case you have downloaded it elsewhere, please specify the correct path to the downloaded file, as shown below
To create an elementary OS install drive: To create an elementary OS install drive on OS X you'll need a USB flash drive that is at least 2 GB in capacity and an app called "Etcher".
Insert the spare USB drive, and select t: Masukkan diska lepas cadangan, lalu pilih berkas ISO yang telah Anda unduh.
Open &quot;Etcher&quot; and select your: Open "Etcher" and select your downloaded elementary OS image file using the "Select image" button.
Etcher should automatically detect your: Etcher should automatically detect your USB drive, but check to see if it has selected the correct target.
Start the flashing process by clicking t: Start the flashing process by clicking the "Flash!" button. It will take a moment to get started.
When complete it will be safe to remove: When complete it will be safe to remove the drive and attempt to boot to install elementary OS.
The following dialog may appear during t: The following dialog may appear during the flashing process, it is safe to ignore.
After you hear the chime, press and hold: After you hear the chime, press and hold <kbd>Option</kbd>. Then, select the appropriate boot drive. Note that it may be incorrectly identified as "Windows", but this is normal.
If your Mac doesn't recognize your eleme: If your Mac doesn't recognize your elementary OS USB Install Drive in the boot menu, you may need to create an elementary OS Install DVD instead. To create one, insert a blank DVD, right click on the ISO file in Finder, and select "Burn elementaryos-freya-xx.xx.iso to Disc". When complete, attempt to boot again from the Install DVD.

You'll need a USB flash drive with at le: You'll need a USB flash drive with at least 2 GB of free space and a program called UNetbootin.
Open UNetbootin from the Dash. It will o: Buka UNetbootin dari Dash. Ia akan membuka tampilan baru seperti di bawah ini:
Click &quot;…&quot; to select the ISO th: Klik "..." untuk memilih berkas ISO yang telah Anda unduh.
Unplug all USB memory devices apart from: Unplug all USB memory devices apart from the one you want to use.
Click &quot;OK&quot; and wait for the pr: Klik "OK" dan tunggu proses tersebut selesai.
